meanings.definition: An electronic device used to measure and display voltage signals.
meanings.sent1: The oscilloscopes in the lab helped us see the electrical patterns.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use oscilloscopes to study electricity in detail.
meanings.sent3: The oscilloscopes at the science fair blinked and beeped like tiny robots.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like oscilloscopes, scanning the room for any movement.
meanings.sent5: The oscilloscopes hummed softly, revealing the hidden rhythms of the circuits.

meanings.definition: To observe or analyze electrical waveforms using an oscilloscope.
meanings.sent1: We will oscilloscope the circuit to check for any irregularities.
meanings.sent2: He oscilloscopes the signals to ensure they are stable.
meanings.sent3: She likes to oscilloscope the waves as if they were dancing to music.
meanings.sent4: The detective oscilloscoped the data, searching for clues in the patterns.
meanings.sent5: They will oscilloscope the readings to troubleshoot the issue.
